attributes.action: Start a partition to stop student flats in Yemen please Edinburgh
attributes.additional_details: All so the noise pollution of buildings getting built between Murdoch terrace and Yemen please.
attributes.background: I am looking to stop student flats getting built in Yemen please in Dalton's yard in Edinburgh. As there are to many around fountainbridg area and it will block out Sun light at the back of Murdoch terrace all so with the noise pollution of them moving in.

rejection.details:
Planning decision in the city of Edinburgh are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, but that of the local council or authority.

The City of Edinburgh Council have a process for petitions which could be of interest to you. You can find out more via the link below:

https://www.edinburgh.gov.uk/say/petitions/1
